subject: Order #SSN4090
description_text: Hi I received half of my shipment but the other half hasnâ€™t even shipped yet and it has been two weeks is there any update on the second half of my order?

conversations.body_text: Hi Vincent Swift,    We sincerely apologize for the delay caused by the shortage of baseplate stock in our U.S. warehouse. We will ship your order immediately upon receiving the item today.

Will i be provided a tracking number when it ships?

>

Will i be provided with a updated tracking number?

>
